main.name: Hi, I'm Thinh Tran
main.bio: Senior engineering leader with {yearsOfExperience}+ years of experience building scalable software products. From co-founding a tech company to leading engineering teams as VP of Engineering, I specialize in full-stack development, blockchain, and cloud architecture. I've shipped enterprise systems, blockchain games, and mobile apps used across multiple countries.
